column4: has anyone had any luck getting ati 200m cards working in hardy.  i got about 800fps in gutsy and only about 400 in hardy.
glxgears is not a benchmark
what does 'glxinfo | grep direct' say?
ok.  it's still visually worse. hold on.
it says direct rendering no; opengl renderer string mesa glx indirect
and that's after applying the restricted hardware driver.
it seems to be broken
if you look in your /var/log/Xorg.0.log you may see some DRM errors
do you know how to fix it?
did you use something other than the restricted driver manager on gtusy?
i'm not sure what i'm looking for.
i have drmOpenDevice node name /dev/dri/card 0 - 14 notices.  all say no such device or adrress.
that means the fglrx kernel module isn't getting loaded
it's often very hard to fix :/
do you know how to fix that?
make sure you don't have anything in DISABLED_MODULES in /etc/default/linux-restricted-modules-common
i checked.  not even a disabled_modules section in that file.
ok, try: sudo apt-get --reinstall install linux-restricted-modules-$(uname -r)
then reboot
ok.  trying now.
will it require a restart?
yes
ok.  i'll get on here again after restart.  thank for the help so far! :)
